statements: DELETE FROM training_data WHERE episode=5 AND rewards > 100;
DELETE FROM training_data WHERE id = 1 AND episode = 5;
DELETE FROM training_data WHERE rewards < 0.0 OR steps > 1000;

DELETE FROM episode WHERE total_reward > 1000 AND start_date < '2023-06-01';
